comment: She smiles when she talks and is passionate about teaching Chemistry. She explains important chemistry concepts before each lab to ensure everyone is on the same page. Herself and her lab TAs were always happy to help and offer assistance on the lab. Highly recommended.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--ACCESSIBLE OUTSIDE CLASS--Caring

comment: She explains most chemistry concepts in her brief pre-labs better than my professor can in an hour of lecture. Very approachable and helpful; willing to walk through problems with you if you're struggling to understand something. Labs and reports are straightforward, though they do take a notable amount of prep work. Best lab instructor I've had.
Explains things very well and helps with the lecture too. She was always willing to help students and seems to really enjoy teaching!
Nice professor. Clear instructions and likes to go above and beyond to help students. Would recommend!
